column1: CIO-CI-Access Team, Ministry of Defence, CIO-FOI@mod.uk

column3: Request Summary

Request for "A strategy for promoting an integrated approach to the management of coastal areas in England" draft consultation document and final document; and the overall consultation process for the strategy.

That further enquiries be made, with the Central Criminal Records Information Office (CCRIO), concerning the RAF/SIB Police Investigation in which I was asked to provide a witness statement, at RAF Akrotiri in 1981.
The extent of involvement of the Ministry of Defence in Operation Gladio.
Information about any compensation claims, including legal actions, brought against the MoD by serving or former personnel between October 2001 and January 2011.

Information about the types of illegal drugs (including, but not limited to amphetamines) that have been seized by either (a) the British Army, (b) the Royal Military Police, (c) the Royal Navy or (d) the Royal Air Force between January 2001 and January 2011.

Chasing-up late response to request for any and all details of military exercises or other operations conducted by army, air force
or navy on the Berwyn mountain range in North Wales, from January to March 1974.
Please clarify that an extra 6 months was or was not served by the latter intakes of National service.
Details on how many MOD staff work from home. Also, the pay grade of each member of staff who works from home.
Information regarding the supposed UFO crash In the Berwyn mountains near Curwen.
Copies of meeting notes regarding the British Forces Medical Healthcare Services (BFG HS in Germany) regarding a specified individual
UK Armed Forces hearing loss/problems numbers (Discharged and Claims data)
The total expenditure on renovation and redecoration by the department since the formation of the new government in May 2010.
I would like to be provided with all stored copies of the web page at http://www.metoffice.gov.uk/weather/uk/se/london_forecast_weather.html
Information on whether Alcohol is allowed for consumption by off duty UK service personnel in Afghanistan and Iraq.
Information on the Admiralty undertaking an investigation into practices relating to the punishment of officers since 1856 (the file reference was X3324).
Details of bonuses paid to MoD staff in Northern Ireland from 2007 to 2010 calendar years.
I am looking for information about UFO sightings in and around the West Midlands area. I am also interested in UFO sightings around London and Maidstone, Kent.
However it has confirmed that it provided a long-range forecast to the Cabinet Office at the end of October highlighting the risk of a cold start to the winter"."
Whether the MOD hold any documents relating to Margaret Thatcher's personnel correspondence with Government and Conservation Party members from 1982 - 1987 and how these can be obtained.
Information on the complete list of services and of estates owned/managed by Defence Estates in Scotland and Northern Ireland.
Written correspondence from the British Forces Medical Service within Germany (Bielefeld) to specified individual to apologise for the accidents that happened under the  Medical Contract within.
How many British regiments have been disbanded in the last 40 years? How many British or ex British troops now work for the UN peace Troops and who pays them?
The number of reservists deployed, the number dying (including suicides) on deployment plus cause of death.
For the academic year 2009/10, how many children of service personnel attending secondary boarding school (public school) had their fees paid wholly or in part by the MOD?
The Public Service Commission of Canada is trying to determine how Non Public Funds (NPF) Employees are governed in other Westminster countries.
Information on the Armed Forces and medicines supply.
How many people civilian and military have been killed by British UAVs in Afghanistan?
A breakdown of the costs of procurement of the new ATC 'Staff Cadet' rank slides and 'Master Cadet' badges. The costs of development, manufacture and cost per unit.

Details of the number of British servicemen who have been convicted of obtaining illegal materials (including drugs and weapons/live ammunition) in Afghanistan either for personal use or with a view to bringing it into the UK with intent to supply.
Any bathymetry data you have available for the coastal zone around the Isle of Wight.
Request for a copy of photos from the visit of F-105's from Spangdahlem to 16 Squadron and any other pictures made during that occasion.

What financial support and funding Britain has given to the Palestinian Authority Security and Intelligence Agencies between 2003 and 2010 and in particular what financial support was given to the
Palestinian Preventive Security Forces?
What happened to all the inhabitants of West Thorney in 1935?

Information on a Canadian unit stationed in UK during World
War II in St.Albans, Herts.
Information on the conditions of service for the British Army
Information on reform(s) that successfully lowered the total expenditure level of the British military in the period 1992 - 2008.
Numbers in receipt of a War pension and Armed Forces Compensation Scheme figures for the North West.
Information relating to the case of 3 missing Israeli soldiers who were captured on the 11 June 1982 hours before a ceasefire was implemented between Israel and Lebanon

Information on the number of members of the Armed Forces who have gone absent without leave (AWOL) in 2010 provided on a month-by-month basis. If this is not available, please provide me with your latest figures.
Equipment maintenance records for a specific weapon and armoured vehicle
Did the RAF/Air Ministry take steps during that test series to sample air in the El Adem/Tobruk area? If sampling was carried out, sight of the measurement data?
I am looking for any archive film footage of RAF Station Hullavington, Chippenham in Wilts, now known as Buckley Barracks.
Information about RN and RM uniform regulations, including SBS uniform and insignia.
Details on the memorials of all known servicemen that died during the Second Anglo Boer War 1899-1902.
Information on when was the government informed that the Met Office expected a harder than normal winter.
Various statistics for Welsh units in the Army.
The rank of the most senior officer currently qualified to fly the Typhoon or Tornado F3.

Details of instructions and requests  on "The handling, dissemination, reporting or restriction of use of the private" seasonal weather forecast supplied to the Cabinet Office by the Met Office for the winter of 2010-11.
Data relating to the number of soldiers recruited from each part of the UK every year going back 30 years.
Retained files on Storage and carriage of nuclear weapons.
Information on whether an invitation to tender has recently been issued for the provision of forensic services to the Royal Military Police.

Information on a briefing authored by the Chief of the Air Staff regarding the possibility of the Royal Marines, the Brigade of Ghurkhas, and the Parachute Regiment becoming part of the Royal Air Force.
A list of the documentation and reports held by DE about The REME Site.
Request all correspondence between DE and the Netheravon Shoot, and Durrington Shoot concerning Choulston Farm over the past 15 yrs. Also between any other 3rd parties and shooting over the farm.
Information on a specified Service Family Accommodation
SIB Report
BOI into helicopter crash
Copy of ACP 34 Volume 2 - Aircraft Handling
AUS(GS) draft paper circulated under D/DS10/44/18 dated 7 December 1971 - including Annex B.
MOD Daily Operational Summaries (OPSUM) for 12 - 14 November 1971 and 4 - 7 December 1971.
Weekly Operational Summaries (including statistics) covering 12 -14 November 1971 and 4 - 7 December 1971.
The monthly reports on Northern Ireland prepared by MO4 covering November and December 1971.
The complete 2010 Trident Value for Money (VFM) review, including all supporting paperwork
Number of DV requests carried out in the last 5 years including details on the most common reasons for refusal.
Details of armed forces personnel divorce figures for specified years broken down into RN, RAF and Army.
Pay scales for MoD grades
Information on a specified individual working at MDPGA AWE.
A break down of MOD spending on outsourced defence contracts including how much MOD contracts last year were worth for Qinetiq and BAE Systems.
Detailed information for the service personnel included in the mental health reports from when they began
Information on a specified individual working at with the MDPGA at AWE?
Please could I have a copy of the business case that was raised in 2010 in order to retain the Recruitment & Retention allowance, raised by AWE Divisional HQ

Information on the total number of single mothers who have applied and been accepted to join the army since 5th March 2007 to  date, and the number of secretarial job vacancies available between March 2007 and June 2008 at the Rheindahlen Barracks in Monchengladbach, Germany.
Please detail a breakdown of the entertainment bill for last year claimed by senior military officers.
Any details regarding contracts for helicopter manufacturer Augusta Westland in the last two years.
I wish to obtain details of agency staff working at St Athan near Barry.
Please detail the £100,864 spent on unplanned maintenance at official service residences last year:
Average weekly fixed wing aircraft movements at RAF Cosford 1/7/10 to 31/12/10.
